title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 28 July 2016 - XWiki
content:
<mbuschman> has joined #xwiki  
01:29 <Slashman> has quit  
01:31 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
01:36 <lkrejci> has quit  
02:18 <mbuschman> Hey, I've got a strange issue regarding Short URLs on 8.2/Tomcat 8.0.32. I'm getting a 500 on /, but other pages work fine.  
02:19 <mbuschman> I get "500 - Failed to extract the Entity Action from URL [http://127.0.0.1:8180/]"  
02:19 <mbuschman> Which tells me that it's not adding the implied view action  
02:19 <mbuschman> I made sure xwiki.showviewaction=0 is defined.  
02:19 <mbuschman> Does anyone have any suggestions?  
03:04 <jonesmeier> has quit  
03:06 <jonesmeier> has joined #xwiki  
03:18 <mbuschman> I switched to UrlRewriteFilter, and that works nicely now that I'm on a good version of Tomcat.  
03:18 <mbuschman> Thanks to whoever added that tip in the red box on the Tomcat page.

12:24 <msmeria1> has quit  
14:16 <ol-ow2> has joined #xwiki  
14:35 <msmeria1> has joined #xwiki  
14:38 <ol-ow2> Hi, my doc A(allowed to guest)  include a groovy script which call a doc as xwiki.getDocument(DocB). DocB doesn't allow view mode to guest. I'm getting a error (null) because groovy attempt to getDocument(DocB) with guest right. How to getDoc(DocB) ?  
14:38 <msmeria> has quit  
14:40 <ol-ow2> or in another words, how to allow  an xwiki.getDocument(DocB) in groovy for guest ?  
14:47 <ol-ow2> any idea cjd ?  
14:47 <cjd> hmm  
14:48 <cjd> xc = xcontext.getContext(); d = xc.getWiki().getDocument("Doc.B", xc);   println(d.getFullName())  
14:48 <cjd> see if that's working  
14:49 <ol-ow2> ok, i'll try this  
14:49 <cjd> but hmm, it's going to give you an XWikiDocument (internal) not a Document (api)  
14:49 <ol-ow2> thx  
14:49 <cjd> so maybe not a good solution, the API is a bit different and annoying and may break without warning  
14:50 <ol-ow2> i expect get objects from docB  
14:50 <cjd> ahh  
14:50 <cjd> try xwiki.getDocumentAsAuthor("Doc.B")  
14:50 <ol-ow2> ok  
14:50 <cjd> that gives you the right type of object  
14:54 <ol-ow2> many thanks cjd, that's work fine  
14:57 <cjd> \*\*AsAuthor() means "using the permissions of the author of the script"  
14:58 <cjd> there's also saveAsAuthor()
